name: Kawaii Pet Shop Monogatari
overview: A new sense RPG that raises pets while running a pet shop. The protagonist runs a pet shop on behalf of a sick grandmother and searches for a remedy for her. Pet shops can receive rewards if they receive requests from customers (want pets, deposit pets, pet medicine, etc.) and clear them by the deadline. Pets can be raised at the ranch in the pet shop, and the raised pets can participate in competitions (comparison of strength, foot race, etc.). Including the remedy for grandma, the medicine finds and formulates the ingredients by itself. GAme music was created by Chiaki Katō.
